metadata.title: CVE-2023-52526 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: erofs:fix memory leak of LZMA global compressed deduplication When stressingmicroLZMA EROFS images with the new global compressed deduplication featureenabled (`-Ededupe`), I found some short-lived temporary pages weren'tproperly released, which could slowly cause unexpected OOMs hours later.Let's fix it now (LZ4 and DEFLATE don't have this issue.)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
